title: Redeem App
content: I was hired by The Redeem Network to build an iOS/Android app that would facilitate the donation of gifts to the homeless.
content2: I built it using React Native, with Google Firebase as the backend. Payments are handled using Stripe. The project took 3 months to get to a feature complete prototype, available for testing on the App Store/Google Play

title: Fieldworks Platform
content: For the past 2 years I have worked with Fieldworks building a platform for grassroots NGOs to raise their profile, and facilitate receiving funding from global donors. There are currently 100 NGOs on the platform.
content2: We hired a junior developer to help for 2 month period, but for 90% of the project I have been the only developer. I have managed all the testing and deployment to both staging and production, which runs on AWS Elastic Beanstalk
